sentences.en: a fire in a remote mountain area
sentences.cn: 偏远山区的火灾

sentences.en: A flying doctor service operates in remote regions.
sentences.cn: 在偏远地区有飞行医生服务。

sentences.en: a remote border town
sentences.cn: 一个偏远的边境小镇

sentences.en: He reached for the remote control and pressed the "play" button.
sentences.cn: 他伸手拿过遥控器，按下“播放”键。

sentences.en: His father was a remote, quiet man.
sentences.cn: 他父亲是个冷淡的人，话不多。

sentences.en: In remote mountain areas, voters arrived on horseback.
sentences.cn: 在偏远山区，选民骑着马赶来了。

sentences.en: It can translate data from maps or remote sensing instruments into images.
sentences.cn: 它可以把从地图或遥感设备中得到的数据转化成为图像。

sentences.en: It is possible to plug into remote databases to pick up information.
sentences.cn: 接入远程数据库来获取信息是可以办到的。

sentences.en: It works by remote control .
sentences.cn: 它通过遥控工作。

sentences.en: Nichols set off for his remote farmhouse in Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 尼科尔斯动身去他在康涅狄格州的偏僻农舍了。

sentences.en: She looked so beautiful, and at the same time so remote.
sentences.cn: 她相貌如此美丽，同时又如此清高不群。

sentences.en: Statistically our chances of being the victims of violent crime are remote.
sentences.cn: 从统计数据来看，我们成为暴力犯罪受害者的可能性微乎其微。

sentences.en: The chances of his surviving are pretty remote.
sentences.cn: 他生还的机会非常渺茫。

sentences.en: The chances of the disease being transferred to humans is extremely remote.
sentences.cn: 该疾病传播到人类身上的几率微乎其微。

sentences.en: The children were squabbling over the remote-control gadget for the television.
sentences.cn: 孩子们正在为抢夺电视机的遥控器而争吵。

sentences.en: The hunter-gatherer lifestyle today survives precariously in remote regions.
sentences.cn: 今天狩猎采集的生活方式在偏远地区侥幸留存了下来。

sentences.en: The prospect of peace seems remote.
sentences.cn: 实现和平的希望似乎很渺茫。

sentences.en: The remote desert area is accessible only by helicopter.
sentences.cn: 只有乘直升机才能进入那遥远的荒漠地区。

sentences.en: the remote time when dinosaurs walked the earth
sentences.cn: 恐龙霸行天下的远古时代

sentences.en: They live in a remote area, inaccessible except by car.
sentences.cn: 他们住在一处偏远地区，只能开车去。

sentences.en: This government depends on the wishes of a few who are remote from the people.
sentences.cn: 这个政府按照那几个疏远群众之人的愿望行事。

words.tran_cn: 遥远；偏僻；细微；时间久远

phrases.tran_cn: 外部场所；边远区；远端地点
遥控监视器；远距离监控装置
远距离操纵，遥控；远程操作
远距离传送，远距离传输
卫星遥感；卫星遥感测量

trans.tran_cn: 偏僻的，遥远的，关系疏远的，微乎其微的，冷漠的，远程的，相差很大的
trans.tran_en: far from towns or other places where people live
